rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard! You helped build
a school, didn't you?

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0002
rows.name:
Thank you so much... Martis was
so down after he couldn't go
to the theological school.

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0003
rows.name:
The village chief was so
proud, too, saying, "Rex is
the pride of our village"...

rows.label: tlk00190110_msg0004
rows.name:
Seeing you grow up into such a fine
young man... and making such wonderful
friends... I'm so happy.
